001package net.tvburger.jdl.adaline;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.Array;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.datasets.SyntheticDataSets;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.NeuralNetworks;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.ObjectiveFunction;
009import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Trainer;
010import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.loss.Objectives;
011import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes.ChainedRegime;
012import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes.Regimes;
013
014public class AdalineLineMain {
015
016    public static void main(String[] args) {
017        SyntheticDataSets.SyntheticDataSet<Float> syntheticDataSet = SyntheticDataSets.line(2, 3, JavaNumberTypeSupport.FLOAT);
018        DataSet<Float> dataSet = syntheticDataSet.load();
019        DataSet<Float> trainingSet = dataSet.subset(10, dataSet.size());
020        DataSet<Float> testSet = dataSet.subset(0, 10);
021
022        Adaline adaline = Adaline.create(1, 1);
023        ObjectiveFunction<Float> objective = Objectives.mSE(JavaNumberTypeSupport.FLOAT);
024        LeastMeanSquares leastMeanSquares = new LeastMeanSquares(0.001f);
025        ChainedRegime regime = Regimes.epochs(100).dumpNodes().reportObjective().stochastic();
026        Trainer<Adaline, Float> adalineTrainer = Trainer.of(new AdalineInitializer(), objective, leastMeanSquares, regime);
027        adalineTrainer.train(adaline, trainingSet);
028        NeuralNetworks.dump(adaline);
029
030        for (DataSet.Sample<Float> sample : testSet) {
031            Array<Float> estimate = adaline.estimate(sample.features());
032            System.out.println("with noise = " + Array.toString(sample.targetOutputs()) + " estimated = " + Array.toString(estimate) + " real = " + Array.toString(syntheticDataSet.getEstimationFunction().estimate(sample.features())));
033        }
034    }
035
036}
